snippet.title: BAHNSEN KNIGHTS - ANNOUNCEMENT (OST)
snippet.description:
BAHNSEN KNIGHTS is the story of a sect that drives around in Ford Sierras picking up corpses after a string of f5 tornadoes hit the States in the 80s. They believe the Devil tricks us into believing Hell is underneath when in fact it's above us.

░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░

WHAT'S THE GAME ABOUT:

The greatest trick the Devil ever pulled was making Dante Alighieri write the Divine Comedy…
…and letting us believe Hell is underground.
Truth is…
Hell is not below, but above us.
Satan is sending tornado after tornado to our land, claiming corpses for his air kingdom…
But guess what? We won’t allow it.
We’ll drive every route and put those bodies into the trunk of our Ford Sierras.
And we’ll make sure to bury every last of them.

DISCORD: http://discord.gg/nnnBbJU3nq
PATREON: http://patreon.com/lcbgamestudio
TWITTER: http://twitter.com/lcbgamestudio
